entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , St. Lawrence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:11 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Lawrence 4:30 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -0.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -5.8°C
Wind: ESE 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 10 except minus 5 along the coast. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
